email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 250m) available for your steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 85/MT. Laycan is 25-30 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quote. USD 85/MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I can offer a reduced rate of USD 80/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 48 hours. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 80/MT is more acceptable. Can we adjust the laycan to 27 October - 1 November? Also, can you confirm the discharge rate?

Best regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Yes, we can adjust the laycan to 27 October - 1 November. The discharge rate is USD 10,000 per day. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Confirmed. Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Please find attached the charter party for your review. Let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Emily
